text: George Jiri Brady O.Ont (born Jiří Brady; 9 February 1928 – 11 January 2019) was a Canadian businessman and Holocaust survivor of Jewish-Czech descent.www.hanassuitcase.ca == Biography == He was a survivor of both Theresienstadt (Terezin) and Auschwitz (Oswiecim, Poland). After World War II, he became a Canadian businessman and was awarded the Order of Ontario. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hana's Story (Brady family website) Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Canadian Jews Category:Czech Jews Category:Czechoslovak people Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Plumbers
title: George Brady
